`` henry laurens states sir circular york 28th november 77. honour writing 1st inst. beg leave refer. obedience order congress forward undermentioned papers. three copies articles confederation perpetual union united states america. 1 copy address congress states respectively recommending immediate consideration important plan compact. 2 copy minutes resolves urging necessity taxation state order raise five million dollars year 1778 service united states one means establishing public credit recommending also confiscation sale estates persons forfeited right protection- purposes. 3 papers expressive meaning good veiws congress require attempt minute detail several contents. therefore repeat request congress take earliest opportunity laying legislature state. 4 honour great regard sir excellency 's obedient servant 5 ``
